HEADER.SEARCH: Search by Address, Block Height, Tx Hash,...

VALIDATOR.stakeAnotherValidator: Use the 'Redelegate' feature to instantly stake your assets to another validator.
VALIDATOR.undelegateNotice:
Once the unbonding period begins you will:
- not receive staking rewards
- not be able to cancel the unbonding
- need to wait {{ timeStaking }} day(s) for the amount to be liquid
VALIDATOR.manageNotice:
You can "Delegate" more to this validator
Or use "Redelagate" to switch your assets to another validator.
Or use "Undelegate" to start the unbonding period.

WALLET.MSG_CONNECT: Connect with one wallet provider or create a new one
WALLET.MSG_CONNECT_DISABLED: The wallet connection feature on mobile web is temporarily pending. Please visit the Aurascan website on desktop to use this feature.

NOTICE.REDELEGATE_WAITING: You must wait {{ timeStaking }} day(s) in order to be able to redelegate from the selected validator.
NOTICE.NUMBER_REDELEGATE: You can redelegate from and to the same validator set only up to 7 times.
NOTICE.ERROR_REDELEGATE_TIME: You can only redelegate from and to this validator up to 7 times.
NOTICE.ERROR_REDELEGATE_INPROGRESS: You must wait {{ timeStaking }} day(s) in order to be able to redelegate from the selected validator.
NOTICE.ERROR_UNDELEGATE_TIME: You can undelegate from the same validator only up to 7 times.

MESSAGES.NO_PROPOSAL_PERIOD: No proposal within the voting period
MESSAGES.VALIDATOR_TOO_MUCH_VOTING: Validators with too much voting power will lessen the security and decentralization of the network.
MESSAGES.LAST_NUM_BLOCK: Validator's availability in the last {{numBlock}} blocks.
MESSAGES.MORE_VOTING_POWER: The more AURA delegated to a validator, the higher the validator's voting power.
MESSAGES.COMMISSION_REWARD: The proportion of staking reward being taken by the validator as a commission.
MESSAGES.VOTE_PARTICIPATION: Vote participation stat for the last {{countProposal}} proposals.
MESSAGES.INSUFFICIENT_AVAILABLE: Insufficient available balance for transaction fee
MESSAGES.STAKING_WILL_LOCK: Staking will lock your funds for {{ timeStaking }}+ day(s)
MESSAGES.UNDELEGATE_LOCK: You will need to undelegate in order for your staked assets to be liquid again. This process will take {{ timeStaking }} day(s) to complete.
MESSAGES.EXPLAIN_OPERATOR_ADDRESS:
Validator operator address at which token holders delegate
their voting powers to.
MESSAGES.MISSED_BLOCKS: Missed Blocks are displayed with an X
MESSAGES.NO_FT_TRANSFER: No FTs transfer activity due to this transaction
MESSAGES.NO_NFT_TRANSFER: No NFTs transfer activity due to this transaction

VERIFY_CODE_ID.E003: Code ID is currently being verified
VERIFY_CODE_ID.E004: Cannot get data hash of Code ID
VERIFY_CODE_ID.E005A: Cannot find github repository of this contract. Maybe your project is Private
VERIFY_CODE_ID.E005C: Source code is missing Cargo.lock file
VERIFY_CODE_ID.E006: Smart contract source code or compiler version is incorrect
VERIFY_CODE_ID.E007B: Data hash mismatch. Maybe your compiler version or commit is incorrect
